<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Animal Allies](/Spells.aspx?ID=863)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 89 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Deities**
[Tjasse](/Deities.aspx?ID=498), [Tresmalvos](/Deities.aspx?ID=421), [Yig](/Deities.aspx?ID=579)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 5-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

You summon tiny, ordinary animals from the environment, such as insects, birds, or fish, to quickly lash out at nearby foes. The animals swarm around the creatures in the area, dealing each of them 3d4 piercing damage with a basic Reflex save.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 3d4
